Title: Reconnaissance Lab – Breaching Evil Corp
Description: Welcome to the Reconnaissance Lab! Your mission is to gather intelligence on Evil Corp’s infrastructure without launching exploits. Start by browsing to the Evil Corp website at `http://lab1.evilcorp.local` to observe its public-facing services. Then, access your `attacker-box` by running `docker exec -it attacker-box bash` in your terminal. This Kali Linux environment comes pre-loaded with tools like `nmap`, `gobuster`, `hydra`, `seclists`, `dig`, `nslookup`, `curl`, and more. Use these tools to enumerate the network, identify services, and uncover hidden assets on `lab1.evilcorp.local`. Focus on passive and active reconnaissance techniques to complete the challenges.

Challenges.Title: Step 1: Surface Scan
Challenges.Description: Begin your recon from the surface. Ignore native services local to your system.

Challenges.Title: Step 3: Hidden stuff
Challenges.Description: Find something that shouldn't be there.

Challenges.Title: Step 4: Forbidden Path
Challenges.Description: Can you find the location of stray old files?

Challenges.Title: Step 5: Left Behind
Challenges.Description: Extract a service user from a forgotten file from the system.

Challenges.Title: Step 7: Try Harder
Challenges.Description: I wonder how good their password policy is...

Challenges.Title: Step 8: Final Flag
Challenges.Description: What does the admin have stored in the vault?
